# Overview

This directory contains 3 subdirectories: `Materials/`, `Raw data/`, and `TextGrids/`.
See the `README.md` files of each individual directory for more information about the contents.

```{r retrieve}
# Main repo "Many Speech Analysis": https://osf.io/3bmcp/
osf_repo <- osf_retrieve_node("3bmcp")
# Repo components
osf_comps <- osf_ls_nodes(osf_repo)
# Dataset & Materials component
data_comp <- osf_comps %>% filter(name == "Dataset & Materials")
```

```{r data_files, include=TRUE}
osf_ls_files(data_comp) %>%
  select(name) %>%
  filter(str_detect(name, ".*\\.md", negate = TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(name)
```
